Head of the Guild of Fishermen of Santiago:
Are you interested in the Fishing Rod of the Skilled Fisherman? Hehe, so you already consider yourself a true professional?
You diligently helped the Fishermen's Guild and earned a better bait, huh?
You now have an ordinary sturdy fishing rod, but if you prove that you have become a skilled fisherman, we will make a special bait for you. Then you can achieve better results.
But while you are too early to think about a new fishing rod. Come back when the level of trust of our guild to you will be at least 2.
